nodes.text: The D'Asta private fleet was the largest privately owned fleet in the galaxy that was under the control of the Imperial Baron Ragez D'Asta and his family.
In 4 ABY, several bulk cruisers from this fleet were used by Admiral Llon Banjeer to house TIE/LN starfighters at the Battle of the Hast Shipyards.
By the time of the Crimson Empire, it was the largest private fleet of the galaxy.
In 11 ABY, Baron Ragez D'Asta used this fleet to defeat the Imperial Navy lead by self-proclaimed Emperor Xandel Carivus.
